## Install packages


We're going to use a few packages right out the gate, you can install them using the code below:



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
install.packages(c("tidyverse", "remotes", "unvotes"))
```
:::


To install my R package, you'll need: 


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
remotes::install_github("hail2thief/juanr")
```
:::
